meanings.definition: A public sale in which goods or property are sold to the highest bidder.
meanings.sent1: At the auctions, people bid to buy things.
meanings.sent2: The auctions were filled with eager bidders trying to get the best deals.
meanings.sent3: During the auctions, a cat accidentally bid on a painting with its paw.
meanings.sent4: The auctions were like a battlefield where only the highest bidder emerged victorious.
meanings.sent5: The auctions buzzed with excitement as the auctioneer called out the prices.

meanings.definition: The act of selling goods or property at an auction.
meanings.sent1: Participating in auctions requires understanding the rules of bidding.
meanings.sent2: The success of the auctions depended on the items being auctioned.
meanings.sent3: The auctions turned into a frenzy as the bidding war escalated.
meanings.sent4: In the world of auctions, timing is crucial to secure the best deals.
meanings.sent5: The auctions showcased a variety of items up for sale to the eager crowd.

meanings.definition: To sell goods or property at an auction.
